note:
I talk to teens about dead people. BA & MA in History. Hosting #TeachWorldHistory on Historians.Social for WH teachers from grade 7 through university level. I post about World History, teaching, mental health, books, and fandom.  She/They, 39, and married.

My avatar is a photo of me with shoulder length brown and purple hair, wearing a black shirt. My header is an excerpt from Janet Abu-Lughod’s Before European Hegemony.
